verbs.description: [ARG1: Scaramucci 's email to Goldstone] [V: came] [ARGM-TMP: in late July 2017] , [ARGM-TMP: after Trump appointed him White House communications director] .
Scaramucci 's email to Goldstone came in late July 2017 , after [ARG0: Trump] [V: appointed] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: White House communications director] .
